# Markdown table with GitHub flavor
|                 A                 |                       B                       |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------: |
| $$\textcolor{#cd3131}{\tt{abc}}$$ |   $$\textcolor{#0dbc79}{\underline{\tt{1}}}$$ |
| $$\textcolor{#cd3131}{\tt{efg}}$$ |   $$\textcolor{#0dbc79}{\underline{\tt{2}}}$$ |
